Bosses.Name: Kottos the Gigas
Bosses.Strategy: Every so often Kottos will jump to 3 areas with a massive circle AoE, move to a safe spot to avoid this.

KeyMechanics.Name: Grand Slam
KeyMechanics.Description: Deals a large amount of damage to the main target.

KeyMechanics.Name: Lumbering Leap
KeyMechanics.Description: Kottos will jump to 3 areas, causing a massive circle AoE to appear at the location.

KeyMechanics.Name: Colossal Slam
KeyMechanics.Description: A large cone AoE targeted on a random player.

KeyMechanics.Name: Catapult
KeyMechanics.Description: Kottos will throw a rock at a random player.

Bosses.Name: Ichorous Ire
Bosses.Strategy: Will occasionally split off into multiple Ichorous Drips below 50%% HP, which will each explode after a short time.

KeyMechanics.Name: Fluid Spread
KeyMechanics.Description: Deals a large amount of damage to the main target.

KeyMechanics.Name: Divide
KeyMechanics.Description: Split into Ichorous Drips, casting an AoE on each one.

Bosses.Name: Gyges the Great
Bosses.Strategy: Will occasionally recenter and cast a circle AoE in a circle shape. Move between the AoEs to avoid damage.

KeyMechanics.Name: Grand Slam
KeyMechanics.Description: Deals a large amount of damage to the main target.

KeyMechanics.Name: Gigantic Swing
KeyMechanics.Description: Donut AoE centered on the boss. Move into the boss' hitbox to avoid damage.

KeyMechanics.Name: Gigantic Smash
KeyMechanics.Description: Recenters and casts an AoE from the center along with 5 more on the outside of the arena.

KeyMechanics.Name: Colossal Slam
KeyMechanics.Description: A large cone AoE targeted on a random player.
